query.pigql: q=load "WebsitePerformance";q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=cogroup a by (Date_Month) left , b by (Date_Month); a = group a by (Date_Year, Date_Month); a = foreach a generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('Exit1') as Sessions; c = foreach c generate first(a['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ a['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(b[Exit1]) as Sessions; p= union a,c; p=group p by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type); p=foreach p generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month', Type as Type_p, sum('Sessions') as Sessions_p;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('Exit1') as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(h[Exit1]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_j;k=union p,j;k=foreach k generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Sessions_j) else sum(Sessions_p)  end) as 'ExitTimeLine',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_p end) as Type,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' else 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month' end) as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=cogroup a by (Date_Month) left , b by (Date_Month); a = group a by (Date_Year, Date_Month); a = foreach a generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', sum(Unique_Pageviews) as Sessions; c = foreach c generate first(a['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ a['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', sum(b[Unique_Pageviews]) as Sessions; p= union a,c; p=group p by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type); p=foreach p generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month', Type as Type_p, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_p;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', sum(Unique_Pageviews) as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Last Year" as 'Type', sum(h[Unique_Pageviews]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_j;k=union p,j;k=foreach k generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Sessions_j) else sum(Sessions_p)  end) as 'UniquePageViews',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_p end) as Type,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' else 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month' end) as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q=filter q by date(Date_Year,Date_Month, Date_Day) in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q1 = group q by 'Date_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'Date_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all;u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*1 end)  as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q=filter q by date(Date_Year,Date_Month, Date_Day) in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q1 = group q by 'Date_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'Date_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 1 else ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear')))+1 end) as 'Year_Diff';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=cogroup a by (Date_Month) left , b by (Date_Month); a = group a by (Date_Year, Date_Month); a = foreach a generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as Sessions; c = foreach c generate first(a['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ a['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(b[Avg_Time_on_Page1]) as Sessions; p= union a,c; p=group p by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type); p=foreach p generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month', Type as Type_p, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_p;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(h[Avg_Time_on_Page1]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_j;k=union p,j;k=foreach k generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Sessions_j) else sum(Sessions_p)  end) as 'AvgTimeLine',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_p end) as Type,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' else 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month' end) as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month';

q = load "WebsitePerformance"; q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as sum_Result;

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}}; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else coalesce(sum(sum_Pageviews_e),0) end) as 'sum_Result'

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}}; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else coalesce(sum(sum_Pageviews_e),0) end) as 'sum_Unique_Pageviews'

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as 'sum_Avg_Time_on_Page1'

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q = filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=group q by all; q=foreach q generate (({{coalesce(cell(BounceRateCY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}}-{{coalesce(cell(BounceRatePY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(cell(BounceRatePY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}}*100) as 'sum_Result';

q = load "WebsitePerformance"; q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate sum('Unique_Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as 'sum_Unique_Pageviews'

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=cogroup a by (Date_Month) left , b by (Date_Month); a = group a by (Date_Year, Date_Month); a = foreach a generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('BounceRate') as Sessions; c = foreach c generate first(a['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ a['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(b[BounceRate]) as Sessions; p= union a,c; p=group p by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type); p=foreach p generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month', Type as Type_p, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_p;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', avg('BounceRate') as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', avg(h[BounceRate]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_j;k=union p,j;k=foreach k generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Sessions_j) else sum(Sessions_p)  end) as 'Result',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_p end) as Type,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' else 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month' end) as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q = filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=group q by all; q=foreach q generate (({{coalesce(cell(Avg_Time_CY.result,0,"sum_Avg_Time_on_Page1"),0).asObject()}}-{{coalesce(cell(Avg_Time_PY.result,0,"sum_Avg_Time_on_Page1"),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(cell(Avg_Time_PY.result,0,"sum_Avg_Time_on_Page1"),0).asObject()}}*100) as 'sum_Result';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=group q by all; q=foreach q generate (({{coalesce(cell(Unique_Pageviews_1.result,0,"sum_Unique_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}}-{{coalesce(cell(Unique_Pageviews_2.result,0,"sum_Unique_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(cell(Unique_Pageviews_2.result,0,"sum_Unique_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}}*100) as 'sum_Result';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q1 = group q by 'Date_Year';q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear';q1 = order q1 by 'Date_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear';u = union q1,q2;u = group u by all;u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-365 end) as 'Day_Diff';

q=load "WebsitePerformanceChannelGrouping";q = filter q by !('Default_Channel_Grouping' in ["(Other)", "(not set)"]);q=filter q by {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}};q=filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q=group q by Default_Channel_Grouping;q=foreach q generate Default_Channel_Grouping as Default_Channel_Grouping,sum('Sessions') as 'Result';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".. "current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; c=cogroup a by (Date_Month) left , b by (Date_Month); a = group a by (Date_Year, Date_Month); a = foreach a generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', sum(Pageviews) as Sessions; c = foreach c generate first(a['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ a['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', sum(b[Pageviews]) as Sessions; p= union a,c; p=group p by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type); p=foreach p generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month', Type as Type_p, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_p;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year" as 'Type', sum(Pageviews) as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Previous Year" as 'Type', sum(h[Pageviews]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as Sessions_j;k=union p,j;k=foreach k generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(Sessions_j) else sum(Sessions_p)  end) as 'Page Views',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_p end) as Type,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' else 'Date1_Year~~~Date1_Month' end) as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q = filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=group q by all; q=foreach q generate (({{coalesce(cell(ExitCY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}}-{{coalesce(cell(ExitPY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(cell(ExitPY.result,0,"sum_Result"),0).asObject()}}*100)  as 'sum_Result';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}}; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate avg('BounceRate') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else coalesce(sum(sum_Pageviews_e),0) end) as 'sum_Result'

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};a = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; a = group a by 'Date_Month'; a = foreach a generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month', sum('Sessions') as 'sum_Sessions',"Current Year" as Type; b = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];b = group b by 'Date_Month'; b = foreach b generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month', sum('Sessions') as 'sum_Sessions',"Previous Year" as Type; c=union a,b; c=group c by ('Date_Month',Type); c=foreach c generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month_c', sum(sum_Sessions) as sum_Sessions_c, Type as Type_c;d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"];d = group d by 'Date_Month'; d = foreach d generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month', sum('Sessions') as 'sum_Sessions',"Previous Year" as Type; e=union a,d; e=group e by ('Date_Month',Type); e=foreach e generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month_e', sum(sum_Sessions) as sum_Sessions_e, Type as Type_e;g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];i = cogroup g by (Date_Month) left , h by (Date_Month);g = group g by (Date_Year, Date_Month); g = foreach g generate 'Date_Year' + "~~~" + 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Current Year 12 months ago" as 'Type', sum(Sessions) as Sessions;i = foreach i generate first(g['Date_Year'])+"~~~"+ g['Date_Month'] as 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month', "Last Year 12 months ago" as 'Type', sum(h[Sessions]) as Sessions;j= union g,i;j=group j by ('Date_Year~~~Date_Month',Type);j=foreach j generate 'Date_Year~~~Date_Month' as 'Date_Month_j', Type as Type_j, sum(Sessions) as sum_Sessions_j; f=union c,e,j;f=foreach f generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Sessions_e) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Sessions_j) else sum(sum_Sessions_c)  end) as 'sum_Sessions',(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then Date_Month_e when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then 'Date_Month_j' else Date_Month_c end) as Date_Month,(case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then Type_e when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then Type_j else Type_c end) as Type;

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"]; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["30 days ago".."current day"];g = group g by 'Date_Month'; g = foreach g generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month', sum('Sessions') as 'sum_Sessions',"Current Year" as Type; h = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["30 days ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"];h = group h by 'Date_Month'; h = foreach h generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month', sum('Sessions') as 'sum_Sessions',"Previous Year" as Type; i=union g,h; i=group i by ('Date_Month',Type); i=foreach i generate 'Date_Month' as 'Date_Month_i', sum(sum_Sessions) as sum_Sessions_i, Type as Type_i;

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate avg('Avg_Time_on_Page1') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else coalesce(sum(sum_Pageviews_e),0) end) as 'sum_Avg_Time_on_Page1'

q = load "WebsitePerformance"; q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q1 = group q by 'Date_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'Date_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate ((sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1)-1 as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate sum('Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate sum('Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate sum('Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as 'sum_Pageviews'

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago - 1 year".."current day - 1 year"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate sum('Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current day - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate sum('Pageviews') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(LYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate coalesce(sum('Pageviews'),0) as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as 'sum_Pageviews'
q=load "WebsitePerformanceChannelGrouping";q=group q by all;q=foreach q generate sum('Sessions') as 'totalrows';

q=load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=group q by all; q=foreach q generate (({{coalesce(cell(Pageviews_2.result,0,"sum_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}}-{{coalesce(cell(Pageviews_1.result,0,"sum_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}})/{{coalesce(cell(Pageviews_1.result,0,"sum_Pageviews"),0).asObject()}}*100) as 'sum_Result';

q=load "WebsitePerformanceUserType";q=filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}};q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}};q=group q by User_Type;q=foreach q generate User_Type as User_Type,sum('Sessions')as 'Result';

q = load "WebsitePerformance"; q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q1 = group q by 'Date_Year'; q1 = foreach q1 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_CurrentYear', 0 as 'avg_DueDateYear'; q1 = order q1 by 'Date_Year' desc; q1 = limit q1 1; q2 = filter q by  {{column(Date_Year_1.selection,["Date_Year"]).asEquality("Date_Year")}}; q2 = group q2 by 'Date_Year'; q2 = foreach q2 generate 'Date_Year' as 'Date_Year', 0 as 'avg_CurrentYear', avg('Date_Year_New') as 'avg_DueDateYear'; u = union q1,q2; u = group u by all; u = foreach u generate (case when sum('avg_DueDateYear')> 3000 then 0 else (sum('avg_CurrentYear')- sum('avg_DueDateYear'))*-1 end) as 'Year_Diff';

q = load "WebsitePerformance";q= filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["10 years ago".."current day"];q = filter q by  {{column(Country_1.selection,["Country"]).asEquality("Country")}}; q=filter q by {{column(Date_Month_1.selection,["Date_Month"]).asEquality("Date_Month")}};q=filter q by {{column(Week_1.selection,["Week_New"]).asEquality("Week_New")}}; g = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["12 months ago".."current day"]; g=group g by all;g = foreach g generate  avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_g';d = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; d=group d by all;d = foreach d generate  avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_d';e = filter q by date('Date_Year', 'Date_Month', 'Date_Day') in ["current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year".."current year - {{cell(CYYear1.result,0,"Year_Diff").asObject()}} year"]; e=group e by all;e = foreach e generate  avg('Exit1') as 'sum_Pageviews_e';c=union g,d,e;c=group c by all;c=foreach c generate (case when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}"=="{{column(current_year_1.result,["Date_Year"]).asObject()}}" then sum(sum_Pageviews_d) when "{{cell(Date_Year_1.selection,0,"Date_Year").asObject()}}" == "" then sum(sum_Pageviews_g) else sum(sum_Pageviews_e) end) as 'sum_Result'
